dialogue: Friends. Family. We are gathered to celebrate here today the joyous union of Ross and Emily. May the happiness we share with them today be with them always. Now Emily, repeat after me. I, Emily...
You know, nothing makes God happier than when two people, any two people, come together in love. Friends, family, we're gathered here today to join Carol and Susan in holy matrimony.
I think we’d better start again. Ross, repeat after me. I, Ross…
As my lawfully wedded wife, in sickness and in health, till death parts us.
Ross and Emily have made their declarations and it gives me great pleasure to declare them husband and wife.
